document_title: Breast enlargement: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Breast hypertrophy is a condition when mammary tissue fibers grow rapidly and heavily beyond normal levels (>3% of body weight), which can occur on one side or both breasts. Most of these fibroids are quite benign, but they cause imbalance in the body and are potentially dangerous.
Breast enlargement is considered a benign disease, common in women
